main event: A civilian in Chicopee, Massachusetts reported a sighting of a bright light in the sky that pulsated, changed color, and moved erratically. The object was estimated to be at an altitude of 2000-3000 feet and was visible for approximately 20 minutes before disappearing behind clouds. No sound was heard, and the witness could not determine the size, shape, or speed of the object. The conclusion was that the object was unidentified.
interesting points: The UFO sighting occurred in Chicopee, Massachusetts on August 15, 1956.
The witness observed a bright light in the sky which changed color and moved erratically for approximately 20 minutes.
No sound was heard during the sighting, and the witness could not determine the size, shape, or speed of the object.
The object disappeared behind clouds and was not seen again.
The official conclusion was that the object was unidentified.
